title: Aces and Ashes
description: With fire comes pain.They say everything comes full circle. And history was repeating itself.With pain comes suffering.An aristocratic playground founded on anarchy and chaos - fuelled by a gang war made pretty by cash. We were once the Kings. And now everything has been ruined. When the Kings have fallen and we're backed into a checkmate, what options do we have?People who fight fire with fire, usually end up with ashes.But we're not going down without a fight.You watched me burn. Now watch me rise from the ashes.
author: Steph Macca
